message: Let's start fair. I take 90% and you get 10%.
My turn for a proposal. This is a more favorable split for me.  Let's settle this quickly.
Let's compromise. I'll take 70% and you take 30%.
Time is running out, Alice. This offer is a good compromise.  Take it before inflation eats away at the value!
I'm willing to go lower, but this is my final offer.  It's a fair split considering the inflation.  Accept this and we can both walk away with something.
